verses.chords: D                           A7  D   @                              A    @D                             A7   D  @A#      D        A7             D
verses.lyrics: I must tell Jesus all of my tri-als @I cannot bear these burdens a-lone @In my distress He kindly will help me @He ever loves and cares for His own

verses.chords: A7   D    @                            A      @D                            A7   D   @A#          D       A7          D
verses.lyrics: I must tell Jesus all of my trou-bles @He is a kind, compassionate friend @If I but ask Him, He will de-li - ver @Makes of my troubles quickly an end

verses.chords: A7    D  @                             A   @D                             A7   D  @A#       D        A7          D
verses.lyrics: O how the world to evil al-lures me @O how my heart is tempted to sin @I must tell Jesus and He will help me @Over the world the vict'ry to win

choruses.chords: G      @         D                 A    @D                              A7   D    @A#        D       A7       D
choruses.lyrics: I must tell Jesus! I must tell Jesus! @I cannot bear my burdens a-lone @I must tell Jesus! I must tell Je - sus! @Jesus can help me, Jesus a-lone

bridges.chords: A7    D  @                             A   @D                                A7  D   @A#          D       A7                D
bridges.lyrics: Father alone will know all about it @Father alone will understand why @Cheer up my sisters, walk in the Spi-rit @We'll under-stand in the sweet by-and-by
